1.0.2.name: wordpress/wp-webrupee
1.0.2.description:
It converts all the Rs / Rs. symbol to Rupee Symbol. This Rupee symbol is dynamically generated by WebRupee API for web viewing. It's not an image. The visitors to your website do not require a special font installed at their end. Its our try to contribute to our nation's success.

Visit http://www.kdcLabs.com for more info about this plugin.
